vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Shing Mao and wife Chung-Fong Mao, Yun-Seng Chou, May Liu Chen and Ying Chen Ho, Trustees, of approximately 141,339 square feet of land located near the intersection of Kit Lane and Coit Road for the District 11 New Park at Kit Lane Project - Not to exceed $1,500,000.00 ($1,480,000.00, plus closing cost and title expenses not to exceed $20,000.00) - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
